name: Darkflow
storyline: Set 1,000 years after human civilization has fallen, Darkflow takes place in a universe that is still reeling from a long forgotten war. Featuring one of the most accurate representations of a black hole in any game or film, Darkflow brings an unprecedented space experience to you with stunning levels of fidelity.
summary: Darkflow is a sci-fi adventure RPG that chronicles an epic, universe-spanning saga. Fight your way up from the slums to battle rival alien factions, take down cybernetically enhanced enemies, and discover the hidden powers pulling the strings.
